name.ch: 電子商務人力資源管理

goal.ch: 資訊科技進步造成企業競爭全球化，面對激烈的全球競爭與多樣多變的顧客需求，如何確保企業的永續經營是重要議題。其中人力資源是企業最重要的資產，如何做好人力資源管理，以提高企業競爭力，更攸關企業經營成敗關鍵。本課程除探討人力資源管理的專責性與管理性角色，亦探討其策略性功能以及國際情勢與科技創新等所造成的衝擊，並透過實務案例的討論、專題演講與分組報告，以增進學生對人力資源管理在組織的角色功能的認識。
goal.en: "This course deals with the essence of human resource management for students to acquire proficiency in management knowledge and skills. As human capital becomes one of the most important assets for organizations, competing for talent and building and deploying talent resources would enhance organizations’ gaining the competitive advantage. Students aspiring to be business executives and HR professionals will find this class useful in providing theories and techniques to make better decisions and enhance organizational success."
